amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds in contravention of current law which prevents illegal immigrants from obtaining housing assistance.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to use in contravention of subpart E of part 5 of regulations of the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development (24 C.F.R. Part 5, Subpart E; relating to restrictions on assistance to noncitizens).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Yoho amendment (A060) Agreed to by recorded vote: 244 - 181 (Roll no. 319).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Yoho amendment (A060) Agreed to by recorded vote: 244 - 181 (Roll no. 319).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A060) offered by Mr. Yoho.
